New Records: Arshdeep picked up Player of the Match award with career-best figures of 4-9.
India won the match by 7 wickets.
USA scored 110-8 and India scored 111-3 in 18.2 overs.
Key Match Events: India secured a 7-wicket win against the USA in the match.
Pre-Game Insights: The match was described as tough due to the challenging pitch conditions.
The venue, Nassau County International Cricket Stadium, brought in fans and noise despite criticism.
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma expressed relief at qualifying for the Super Eights.
Aaron Jones acknowledged the USA's effort and looked forward to their next match against Ireland.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was the third game in New York, with low scoring due to bowler-friendly surfaces.
USA's future remains in their hands with one more match against Ireland.
The tournament will move to Florida for the next group stage.
Others: The match was a thrilling event with significant implications for the group standings.
